settings.message_text: Use this announcement bar to share some news and link to page or product.

settings.title: Memorial Day Grill Bundles
settings.text: Grill like a pro this Memorial Weekend with our new Grill Bundle! Choose between our Standard Grill Bundle, which includes 2 packs of Wagyu hot dogs, 2 packs of Wagyu hamburger patties, and 1 BCW seasoning, or our Deluxe Grill Bundle, the same as the standard bundle with an added 4 BC20 baseball steaks. Don't miss out, these boxes are only available for a limited time.

settings.title: Fresh and Frozen Shipping
settings.text: While we offer Fresh and Frozen products, if both Fresh and Frozen products are purchased they will ship Frozen.
